
```{r echo=FALSE}
library(arules)
grocery <- read.transactions('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jgscott/STA380/master/data/groceries.txt', sep=',')
summary(grocery)
inspect(grocery[1:10])
itemFrequencyPlot(grocery, topN=50,  cex.names=.5)
```

```{r }
groceryrules <- apriori(grocery, parameter=list(support=.01, confidence=.5,maxlen=4))
inspect(groceryrules)
inspect(subset(groceryrules, subset=lift > 2.2))
inspect(subset(groceryrules, subset=confidence > 0.55))
inspect(subset(groceryrules, subset=support > .005 & confidence > 0.55))
```

```{r}
groceryrules1 <- apriori(grocery, parameter=list(support=.005, confidence=.5,maxlen=4))
inspect(groceryrules1)
inspect(subset(groceryrules1, subset=lift > 5.5))
inspect(subset(groceryrules, subset=confidence > 0.5))
inspect(subset(groceryrules, subset=support > .01 & confidence > 0.55))
```
